body_html: Fair enough, I've changed the fix to substitute 0 for 1 (mirroring the move from curand -> PyTorch uniform) and added a comment. Quite likely, one might rewrite the function a bit to work with [0,1) when it is migrated to ATen native or so.
body_text: Fair enough, I've changed the fix to substitute 0 for 1 (mirroring the move from curand -> PyTorch uniform) and added a comment. Quite likely, one might rewrite the function a bit to work with [0,1) when it is migrated to ATen native or so.
body: Fair enough, I've changed the fix to substitute 0 for 1 (mirroring the move from curand -> PyTorch uniform) and added a comment. Quite likely, one might rewrite the function a bit to work with [0,1) when it is migrated to ATen native or so.
